original_solution_mapping.L1: This past Saturday, Jessy and Alan told a total of 11+7 = <<11+7=18>>18 jokes together.
original_solution_mapping.L2: Since Jessy told eleven jokes this past Saturday, when he doubles the number of jokes next Saturday, the number of jokes will be 2*11= 22 next Saturday.
original_solution_mapping.L3: At the same time, after telling seven jokes this Saturday, when he doubles the number of jokes next Saturday, Alan will tell 2*7 = <<2*7=14>>14 jokes.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Next Saturday, they will tell 14+22 = <<14+22=36>>36 jokes together.
original_solution_mapping.L5: In total, the number of jokes will be 36+18 = <<36+18=54>>54 jokes on the two Saturdays.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 7004.
    Returns: the total number of jokes told by Jessy and Alan over two Saturdays.
    """
    # L1
    jessy_jokes_past_saturday = 11 # eleven jokes this past Saturday
    alan_jokes_past_saturday = 7 # seven jokes
    total_jokes_past_saturday = jessy_jokes_past_saturday + alan_jokes_past_saturday

    # L2
    doubling_factor = 2 # doubled the number of jokes
    jessy_jokes_next_saturday = doubling_factor * jessy_jokes_past_saturday

    # L3
    alan_jokes_next_saturday = doubling_factor * alan_jokes_past_saturday

    # L4
    total_jokes_next_saturday = alan_jokes_next_saturday + jessy_jokes_next_saturday

    # L5
    total_jokes_overall = total_jokes_next_saturday + total_jokes_past_saturday

    # FA
    answer = total_jokes_overall
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: This past Saturday, Jessy and Alan told a total of {jessy_jokes_past_saturday}+{alan_jokes_past_saturday} = <<{jessy_jokes_past_saturday}+{alan_jokes_past_saturday}={total_jokes_past_saturday}>>{total_jokes_past_saturday} jokes together.

Since Jessy told eleven jokes this past Saturday, when he doubles the number of jokes next Saturday, the number of jokes will be {doubling_factor}*{jessy_jokes_past_saturday}= {jessy_jokes_next_saturday} next Saturday.

At the same time, after telling seven jokes this Saturday, when he doubles the number of jokes next Saturday, Alan will tell {doubling_factor}*{alan_jokes_past_saturday} = <<{doubling_factor}*{alan_jokes_past_saturday}={alan_jokes_next_saturday}>>{alan_jokes_next_saturday} jokes.

Next Saturday, they will tell {alan_jokes_next_saturday}+{jessy_jokes_next_saturday} = <<{alan_jokes_next_saturday}+{jessy_jokes_next_saturday}={total_jokes_next_saturday}>>{total_jokes_next_saturday} jokes together.

In total, the number of jokes will be {total_jokes_next_saturday}+{total_jokes_past_saturday} = <<{total_jokes_next_saturday}+{total_jokes_past_saturday}={total_jokes_overall}>>{total_jokes_overall} jokes on the two Saturdays.
